import "../App.css"; export const Home = ({ showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage, shelves, setShelves }) => { return (

MyReads

Currently Reading

  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card

Want to Read

    {shelves['wantToRead']?.map((book, index) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors?.map((author, index) => {author}
    )}
    2. )}

Read

  1. The Hobbit
    J.R.R. Tolkien
  2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
    Seuss
  3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
    Mark Twain
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
) }
